casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Richard Marlo MELVIN. No. 214P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Matthew Wunsche, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Richard Marlo Melvin. Tiare B. Smiley, Special Deputy Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th day of April 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th day of June 2006.
